install.name: jTweet
install.author: Joomla Bamboo
install.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: jTweets is a port of the Sea of Clouds jQuery script called Tweet.

field.name: type
field.label: Display your tweets or query?
field.description: If set to displaying your tweets the module will output all of your recent tweets, otherwise if set to query it will display all recent tweets according to the query term.

field.name: userName
field.label: Twitter Username(s)
field.description: Your twitter username or usernames seperated by ','

field.name: query
field.label: Twitter Query
field.description: Search term for recent tweets

field.name: count
field.label: Tweet Count
field.description: Number of tweets to display

field.name: scripts
field.label: CSS and Javascript
field.description: This option can be used to remove all javascript and css from being loaded by the microblog module. If in doubt leave this option enabled. If you are using the Zen Grid framework version2 then the scripts and css files will be loaded via the framework. If your site uses caching then the relevant files will be loaded into the body of your site.

field.name: twitterBird
field.label: Twitter Icon
field.description: Select the twitter bird icon to display beside the first tweet in the twitter module. Please note that if this is set to anything other than none then you must set the avatar size to 0.

field.name: avatar
field.label: Display Avatar?
field.description: Display the avatar before your tweets.

field.name: avatarSize
field.label: Avatar Size
field.description: The size of your twitter avatar

field.name: twitterName
field.label: Display Twitter Name?
field.description: Display the twitter name for the tweet?

field.name: tweetSource
field.label: Display Source?
field.description: Display the source of the tweet?

field.name: joinText
field.label: Display linking text?
field.description: Display the intro text nominated below to preface your tweets.

field.name: noReplies
field.label: Display Replies?
field.description: Display direct replies to other users. Experimental feature that may result in reduced tweets being displayed.

field.name: tweetTemplate
field.label: Choose a Tweet Template
field.description: Pick the layout of your tweets as they areto be displayed.
field.option: avatar + twitter name + join + text + date + tweet source
avatar + twitter name + date + tweet source + join + text
avatar + join + text + twitter name + date + tweet source

field.name: popup
field.label: Display Popup User Info?
field.description: Display the user information in a popup?

field.name: moreInfo
field.label: More Info Text
field.description: Enter the text you would like displayed for more information in a popup.

field.name: popupIntro
field.label: Popup Intro Text
field.description: Enter the intro text you would like displayed in the popup.

field.name: follow
field.label: Display follow text?
field.description: Display the follow text and icon?

field.name: followText
field.label: Follow me text
field.description: Enter the text you would like displayed in the follow me area of the module.

field.name: followStyle
field.label: Follow Icon style
field.description: Select the style you want to apply to the follow text, link and icon.

field.name: followPosition
field.label: Follow Text Position
field.description: Select whether to float the follow text to the left or the right of the module.
